Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia Phillies lead 2-1 in a four-game series with the Atlanta Braves.
Philadelphia has an 80-56 record overall and a 46-25 record in home games.
The Braves are 38-34 in road games and 74-62 overall.
Sunday's game is the 13th meeting between these teams this season, with the Braves leading 7-5 in the season series.
Aaron Nola (12-6, 3.30 ERA, 1.16 WHIP, 153 strikeouts) and Spencer Schwellenbach (5-6, 3.72 ERA, 1.07 WHIP, 102 strikeouts) are the probable starting pitchers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies have a 35-7 record in games when they hit two or more home runs.
The Braves have gone 46-12 in games when they did not give up a home run.
